places.name: Conwy Castle
places.description: A magnificent medieval fortress built by Edward I, showcasing impressive architecture and history.

places.name: Peel Castle
places.description: Peel Castle, located on St Patrick's Isle, Isle of Man, is a historic medieval fortress with Viking origins and stunning coastal views.

places.name: Wartburg
places.description: Wartburg Castle is a historic, medieval fortress with rich cultural significance.

places.name: Rocca a Mare
places.description: Rocca a Mare is a Venetian coastal fortress in Heraklion, Crete, built in the 16th century, featuring sturdy stone walls, historic cannons, and breathtaking sea views.
